quoteRebalanceAmountToReachTargetLeverag.details: Struct-based overload that forwards to the parameterized implementation. Using a struct reduces stack usage.
Quotes the rebalance amount to reach the target leverage in token unit

params.collateralTokenPriceInBase: The collateral token price in base currency
params.currentLeverageBps: The current leverage in basis points unit
params.debtTokenPriceInBase: The debt token price in base currency
params.subsidyBps: The subsidy in basis points unit
params.targetLeverageBps: The target leverage in basis points unit

returns.direction: The direction of the rebalance (1 for increase, -1 for decrease, 0 means no rebalance)
returns.estimatedOutputTokenAmount: The estimated output token amount after the rebalance (in token unit)
returns.inputTokenAmount: The amount of token to call increaseLeverage or decreaseLeverage (in token unit)

userdoc.notice: This library contains the stateless implementation of the DLoopCore logic
